Key Match Events: New Zealand won by 5 wickets with 160 balls remaining
Trent Boult was named Player of the Match for his 3/37 performance
Kusal Perera scored 51 runs off 28 balls for Sri Lanka
Devon Conway scored 45 runs off 42 balls for New Zealand
Rachin Ravindra scored 42 runs off 34 balls for New Zealand
Daryl Mitchell scored 43 runs off 31 balls for New Zealand
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand elected to field first after winning the toss
Match was held at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru
New Zealand earned 2 points from the match
